member.summary: Represents a geometry editor.

member.summary: Undo edit action.

member.summary: Redo edit action.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether an undoing is possible.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether an redoing is possible.

member.summary: Clears the history of edit operations.

member.summary: Gets a number of actions in the history.

member.summary: Gets a number of actions in history that can be undone.

member.name: P:MapAround.UI.WinForms.GeometryEditor.RedoCount
member.summary: Gets a number of actions in history that can be redone.

member.summary: Draws editing geometry.

A method performing map-to-screen conversion
An X offset of geometry in pixels
A Y offset of geometry in pixels

member.name: M:MapAround.UI.WinForms.GeometryEditor.GetSecondaryNodes
member.summary: Gets secondaty nodes of the editing feature. Secondary nodes are nodes placed at the middle points of the feature segments.

member.summary: Tries to add a new node into editing geometry.
member.param: An instance of the ICoordinate to add

member.summary: Tries to activate a node at the specified position.
member.param: A coordinate of node to be activated
A size of node
member.returns: true if the node be activated, false otherwise

member.name: M:MapAround.UI.WinForms.GeometryEditor.UpdateActiveNodePosition(MapAround.Geometry.ICoordinate,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the position of the active node with the specified value
member.param: New position of the active node
A value indicating whether current update should be commited into undo list
member.returns: true if the position has been updated, false otherwise

member.name: M:MapAround.UI.WinForms.GeometryEditor.RemoveActiveNode
member.summary: Removes the active node.

member.summary: Removes specified coordinate patch.
member.param: An zero-based index of patch

member.name: M:MapAround.UI.WinForms.GeometryEditor.RemoveActivePatch
member.summary: Removes the active patch.

member.summary: Inserts a new coordinate patch into the editing geometry.

A coordinates of inserted patch

member.summary: Replaces currently editing geometry with the other one.
member.param: A new instance of IGeometry

member.summary: Gets an index of the last edited coordinate in patch.

member.name: P:MapAround.UI.WinForms.GeometryEditor.Antialias
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an antialias is used to render editing feature.

member.name: P:MapAround.UI.WinForms.GeometryEditor.ActivePatchIndex
member.summary: Gets an index of the last edited patch. The patch is a line path or a contour containing geometry.

member.name: P:MapAround.UI.WinForms.GeometryEditor.ActiveNodeColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a color which is used to draw an active node of editing feature.

member.summary: Gets or sets a color which is used to draw an active patch (contour or line path) of editing feature.

member.summary: Gets or sets a color which is used to draw secondary nodes of editing feature.

member.name: P:MapAround.UI.WinForms.GeometryEditor.PrimaryNodeColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a color which is used to draw primary nodes of editing feature.

member.name: P:MapAround.UI.WinForms.GeometryEditor.InactivePatchColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a color which is used to draw inactive patch (contour or line path) of editing feature.

member.name: P:MapAround.UI.WinForms.GeometryEditor.FillColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a color which is used to draw an interior of polygon.

member.name: P:MapAround.UI.WinForms.GeometryEditor.NodeSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a size of the feature nodes in pixels.

member.name: P:MapAround.UI.WinForms.GeometryEditor.Snapper
member.summary: Gets or sets an object that snaps the editing coordinates.

member.name: P:MapAround.UI.WinForms.GeometryEditor.ResultingGeometry
member.summary: Gets geometry representing the result of editing operations. Changes in the resulting instance will not be reflected in the editor.

member.summary: Dragging is off.

member.summary: Performs drawing a zooming box while user drags a mouse.

member.name: P:MapAround.UI.WinForms.MapControl.Map
member.summary: A map which displays by this control.

member.name: P:MapAround.UI.WinForms.MapControl.Animation
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value that indicates wether an animation effect will be played when the scale has changed.
When the animation is enabled the rendering of map image (and the querying spatial data) is executed in a separate thread. Should take this into account when using spatial data providers or handling a map events.

member.name: P:MapAround.UI.WinForms.MapControl.SelectionMargin
member.summary: Gets or sets a tolerance (in pixels) of feature selection.

member.name: P:MapAround.UI.WinForms.MapControl.AlignmentWhileZooming
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether map should be aligned to mouse pointer.

member.name: P:MapAround.UI.WinForms.MapControl.MouseWheelZooming
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether mouse wheel zooming is enabled.

member.name: P:MapAround.UI.WinForms.MapControl.ZoomPercent
member.summary: Gets or sets a value (percent) of zoom change. This value is used by ZoomIn and ZoomOut methods.

member.name: P:MapAround.UI.WinForms.MapControl.DragMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a mode of mouse dragging.

member.name: P:MapAround.UI.WinForms.MapControl.DragThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets a minimum number of pixels on which user must shift the map to start new image rendering.

member.name: P:MapAround.UI.WinForms.MapControl.SelectionRectangleColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a color of selection rectangle.

member.name: P:MapAround.UI.WinForms.MapControl.AnimationTime
member.summary: Gets or sets a Value (in milliseconds) of the animation effect duration.

member.name: P:MapAround.UI.WinForms.MapControl.IsDragging
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a mouse dragging is currently performing.
